author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3560: Added fallback in UoWProcessor to catch unhandled exceptions and ensure UoW is done. This prevents in-flight registry to be tracked propertly, ensure graceful shutdown doesnt hit timeout due 1 message stuck.

msg: Fixing broken build. Removing incorrect @Override annotation on instance implementing Runnable.run()
